Traits.Name: Terror
Traits.Description: Non-demon characters that attempt to move into an adjacent space to the demon for the first time on their turn or star their turn there must pass a save or treat spaces adjacent to the Demon as impassable terrain. If they start their turn there and fail a save, they are shoved 1.

Traits.Name: Shrieking
Traits.Description: When the Screaming Demon attacks, characters in range 2 of it must save or lose any stances they are holding.
